name: Button Duel
description:
Game made for the Games Plus Jam 3 game jam,

All assets including sounds made by me except for the text font which was made by Dieter Steffmann and can be downloaded HERE

My theme was ONE BUTTON DEATHMATCH

Hope you enjoy the game :D

Game Rules:

You must play with a friend in the same computer.

When the duel starts a random keyboard key will appear on top of your character, 

Player one can have A, Q, W, E, D, C, X, Z, S keys randomly

Player two can have P L, M, N, B, J, I, O, K keys randomly

whoever press the key first kills the enemy :)
